name: Punch (Non Cuban) - Grand Cru - Natural Monarca
additionalNotes:
Punch cigars have a long and storied past that dates to Havana Cuba in the mid-1800s. Produced by General Cigar Co., the non-Cuban version of Punch was one of the first brands to be manufactured in Honduras and it remains one of the bestselling premium cigar brands in the United States. The Punch brand has grown extensively over the years with nine highly rated line extensions to the original Honduran offering. This includes Punch Gran Puro Nicaraguaâ€”the first ever Punch cigar to be handcrafted in Nicaragua.
